analyzed: tattha aham gahapati aḍḍhakaḥ ahu dīnaḥ
tena iva ñātīsu yāmi āmisa kiñcikkha hetu
a dāna sīlāḥ na ca sat dahanti
eyyā asi khippam aham api kassam pūja

original: Ācikkha me taṁ yadi atthi hetu,
analyzed: ācikkha me tam yadi atthi hetu
sat hāyitam hetu vacaḥ suṇoma ati
bhuñjisu bhattam na ca dakkhiṇā rahā
rājā avoca aham api kim dadāmi

original: Ācikkha me taṁ yadi atthi hetu,
analyzed: ācikkha me tam yadi atthi hetu
yakkhaḥ ham asmi param iddhi pattaḥ
na mayham atthi samā sadisā mānusā
tayā anudiṭṭham atulam da tvā saṅghe
